text: is a Japanese football player. He has played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Hashioka was born in Saitama on May 17, 1999. He joined J1 League club Urawa Reds from their youth team in 2017. He played many matches as right side back between 2018 and 2020. Urawa finished in second place in the 2019 AFC Champions League. In January 2021, he moved to Belgian First Division A club Sint-Truidense. He moved to English Premier league club Luton Town in January 2024. In December 2019, Hashioka was selected for the Japan national team for 2019 E-1 Football Championship. He debuted as right side midfielder against China on December 10. Hashioka signed for Luton Town on 30 January 2024.
